entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
